sentences.english: Now his darkly comic sensibility is penetrating a temple of high culture.
sentences.chinese: 而今他的黑暗的喜剧元素，进入了高雅文化的殿堂。

sentences.english: The soap lathers up in an instant and gives off an expensive scent.
sentences.chinese: 这种肥皂会立即起泡并散发出高雅香味。

sentences.english: He has a good clean sense of humour.
sentences.chinese: 他有着高雅而不低俗的幽默感。

sentences.english: Actress Go Ara's mature body is attracting hot attention.
sentences.chinese: 演员高雅拉的成熟身体吸引了大家热潮的注意。

sentences.english: Defeated a powerful enemy with graceful poise.
sentences.chinese: 用高雅的身姿击败强大的敌人。

sentences.english: Fabrics are artificial packs, Seiko slit, even more elegant.
sentences.chinese: 面料均为人工包制，精工细缝，更显高雅。

sentences.english: Higgins tried to mould the cockney girl into a elegant lady.
sentences.chinese: 希金斯想把那个柔弱的女孩造就成一位高雅的淑女。

sentences.english: All the elegance, all the refinement of high society was gathered there.
sentences.chinese: 上流社会的所有高雅和精致都被集中在那儿。

sentences.english: You look graceful with this pearl necklace.
sentences.chinese: 您戴珍珠项链看起来很高雅。

sentences.english: Will it be noble and benevolent?
They are also elegant and valuable presents for your friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 唐三彩还可以作为高雅而珍贵的礼品来馈赠亲友。

sentences.english: The entrance foyer at Twin Oaks is elegant and tasteful.
sentences.chinese: 双橡园的入口玄关，豪华高雅。

sentences.english: You look so elegant in that tight dress.
sentences.chinese: 你穿那件紧身洋装看起来好高雅。

sentences.english: Chong Sheng Hall designs elegant and possesses Southern architectural features.
sentences.chinese: 崇圣堂设计格调高雅，具有南方建筑特色。

sentences.english: The West Lake in Hangzhou City is famous for its aritificial elegance by constructing pavilions and stages.
sentences.chinese: 杭州西湖，水榭歌台，报酬赋予它高雅美。

sentences.english: very nobly and poetically. That's what I call a romantic atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 思想高雅而有诗意，那就是我所说的浪漫。

definition: style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
